= Differentiation =

== Polynomials ==

=== Rule ===

$$
\begin{align*}
y & = ax^n \\
\frac{dy}{dx} & = anx^{n - 1} \\
\end{align*}
$$

=== Common Derivatives ===

* $y = x^2$, $y' = 2x$
* $y = \frac{a}{x}$, $y' = -\frac{a}{x^2}$
* $y = \frac{a}{x^n}$, $y' = -\frac{na}{x^{n + 1}}$
* $y = a\sqrt{x}$, $y' = \frac{a}{2\sqrt{x}}$


== Product Rule ==

$$
y = uv \\
\frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{du}{dx} v + \frac{dv}{dx} u \\
$$


== Quotient Rule ==

$$
y = \frac{u}{v} \\
\frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{\frac{du}{dx} v - \frac{dv}{dx} u}{v^2} \\
$$


== Chain Rule ==

$$
\frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{dy}{du} \frac{du}{dx}
$$


== Trigonometry ==

* $y = \sin{x}$, $y' = \cos{x}$
* $y = \cos{x}$, $y' = -\sin{x}$
* $y = \tan{x}$, $y' = \frac{1}{\cos^2{x}}$
